Package org.opensourcephysics.tools

Class AbstractAutoloadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • org.opensourcephysics.tools.AbstractAutoloadManager

  • public abstract class AbstractAutoloadManager
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    A dialog for managing autoloadable functions for a FunctionTool. The functions are organized by directory and fileName. Each function is described by a name, expression and optional descriptor (eg track type for TrackDataBuilder.AutoloadManager).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setAutoloadData

        public void setAutoloadData​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]>>> data)
        Sets the autoload data. The data is a map of directory path to directory contents, where directory contents is a map of file path to file contents, file contents is a list of function arrays, and each function array is {String name, String expression, optional String descriptor)
        Parameters:
        data - the data
